title: Join lens
text: Incorrect response: Joins are more about the "lines" then the "lens." We must discover and consider the data we will use for joins by using something else.

title: Spreadsheet lens
text: Incorrect response: Although we often look at data in Excel, it is not the end all be all of data. Data analysts must look past the obvious and consider not only the data we see but also the data we don't see.

title: Query goggles
text: Incorrect response: We regularly analyze data using queries to tie it together, but that process happens after we have discovered all the potential data, or in process of discovering potential data.

title: Data lens
text: Data lens is viewing all the data from any object.
